title: Full-Stack Developer Co-Op
miniDescription: My first co-op, where I developed as a full-stack developer, gaining practical skills and valuable experience.
description: At RBC, I contributed to a machine-learning-powered advisor insights web application, enhancing its functionality and user experience using TypeScript, Vue.js, SCSS, Python, and FastAPI. I developed 8 new features, including a global search function and full-stack functionality for favouriting advisor opportunities. These features directly support business intelligence and decision-making for advisors. Working in an agile environment, I collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality, accessible web applications.

title: Portfolio
miniDescription: A personal portfolio showcasing my software development abilities, with a focus on interactive features.
description: I created a personal portfolio using TypeScript, Vue.js, and Vanta.js, featuring interactive animations and a responsive layout for a seamless user experience. I implemented a modal feature for detailed project info and used advanced libraries like TypeIt to enhance interactivity.

title: SportIQs
miniDescription: A dynamic sports trivia website developed to offer an engaging experience with interactive quizzes.
description: I developed a sports trivia game using React and Vite, implementing interactive quizzes and state management to track user progress. This project highlights my ability to create engaging user experiences with dynamic updates and smooth interactivity.

title: Djibouti
miniDescription: An educational game inspired by Wordle, designed to help players learn about countries through daily puzzles.
description: I developed Djibouti, an educational game inspired by Wordle, to teach players about countries. I created daily puzzles that encourage learning geography in an interactive and engaging format. To ensure a reliable user experience, I used Jasmine for testing and validation.

title: Password Manager
miniDescription: A secure password manager application built in Python to store and encrypt user credentials.
description: I built a secure password manager using Python, employing encryption techniques like Fernet encryption and password-based key derivation for enhanced security. The app provides user-friendly features for managing passwords, ensuring both security and ease of use.

title: Front-End Developer
miniDescription: Worked with business stakeholders to build and maintain web pages, applying design feedback to improve usability.
description: I helped build and maintain business web pages for Stone Row Farm using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, improving their online presence. I communicated with the company owners to gather feedback and adjust interface designs, applying front-end development skills in a real-world context while proposing design solutions that aligned with business goals.
